snippet: For 20 years, the trade publication Around the Rings has informed officials, marketers, consultants, politicians and people involved with the Olympics or the pursuit of a future bid.
lead_paragraph: For 20 years, the trade publication Around the Rings has informed officials, marketers, consultants, politicians and people involved with the Olympics or the pursuit of a future bid.

headline.seo: Around the Rings Web Site Keeps Olympic Insiders Informed
headline.main: Chronicling the Business of the Games
headline.print_headline: Chronicling The Business Of the Games
